"About this quest":
"Directive:

The objective of this defense mission is the protection of 3 bases.
The quest will fail when all 3 bases have been destroyed.
Non-Darker enemies will also be making an appearance.

Communicate with other players and cooperate
to ensure the safety of the bases."

"One special rule applies in this mission.
Sockets can not be purified once infected.

Prioritize the elimination of Solda Brahda
to prevent infection of sockets."

"In addition,
certain enemies will unleash a final-ditch attack
in an attempt to destroy the bases.

The bases will sustain heavy damage
if these enemies are not defeated before the end of the wave."
